name: Image.Builder
description: The `Image.Builder` class provides a fluent interface for creating `Image` instances with method chaining. It's the recommended way to create images with complex configurations or when you need to set multiple properties in a readable manner.

methods.name: texture
methods.description: Sets the texture identifier for the image.

methods.name: fromCustomImage
methods.description: Sets texture, position, and size from a CustomImage object.

parameters.name: customImage
parameters.description: The CustomImage object containing texture and dimension info

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Sets the position of the image on the screen.

methods.name: x
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate of the image.

methods.name: y
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate of the image.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Sets the render size of the image.

methods.name: width
methods.description: Sets only the width of the image.

methods.name: height
methods.description: Sets only the height of the image.

methods.name: regions
methods.description: Sets the texture region coordinates and dimensions.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate in texture to start from

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate in texture to start from

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the region in texture to use

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the region in texture to use

methods.name: regionX
methods.description: Sets only the X coordinate in texture to start from.

methods.name: regionY
methods.description: Sets only the Y coordinate in texture to start from.

methods.name: regionWidth
methods.description: Sets only the width of the region in texture to use.

methods.name: regionHeight
methods.description: Sets only the height of the region in texture to use.

methods.name: textureSize
methods.description: Sets the total size of the texture.

methods.name: textureWidth
methods.description: Sets only the total width of the texture.

methods.name: textureHeight
methods.description: Sets only the total height of the texture.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the image color tint using RGB format with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the image color tint using RGB format with custom alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the image color tint using separate RGB values with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the image color tint using separate RGBA values.

methods.name: alpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value.

methods.name: rotation
methods.description: Sets the rotation angle of the image (clockwise).

methods.name: zIndex
methods.description: Sets the z-index for rendering order. Higher values render on top.

methods.name: align
methods.description: Sets the alignment relative to parent container.

methods.name: alignX
methods.description: Sets only the horizontal alignment.

methods.name: alignY
methods.description: Sets only the vertical alignment.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the configured `Image` instance without adding it to the Draw2D context.

methods.name: buildAndAdd
methods.description: Creates the configured `Image` instance and automatically adds it to the Draw2D context.
examples:
const image = draw2D.image("minecraft:texture/gui/icons.png")
    .pos(10, 10)
    .size(32, 32)
    .color(0x00FF00)
    .buildAndAdd(); // Automatically added to Draw2D context
